snippet: Jeremy Lin has New York buzzing again, but this time fans are much more divided on his future with the Knicks, who must match a $25.1 million offer to him by Tuesday night.
abstract: New York Knicks fans are divided over whether the Knicks should match Houston Rockets contract offer in order to keep point guard Jeremy Lin.

byline.contributor: Ken Belson and Tim Rohan contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Jeremy Lin has New York buzzing again, but this time fans are much more divided on his future with the Knicks, who must match a $25.1 million offer to him by Tuesday night.

headline.seo: Jeremy Lin’s Future With New York Knicks Is Dividing Fans
headline.main: For Fans of Knicks, Conflict Over Lin
headline.print_headline: For Fans Of Knicks, Conflict Over Lin
